scripts.seed:all:development: pnpm run dotenv:cli:init && dotenv -e ./env/.env.development -- pnpm run seed:all
scripts.seed:undo:all:development: pnpm run dotenv:cli:init && dotenv -e ./env/.env.development -- pnpm run seed:undo:all
scripts.seed:redo:all:development: pnpm run dotenv:cli:init && dotenv -e ./env/.env.development -- pnpm run seed:undo:all && pnpm run seed:all
scripts.seed:all:production: pnpm run dotenv:cli:init && dotenv -e ./env/.env.production -- pnpm run seed:all
scripts.seed:undo:all:production: pnpm run dotenv:cli:init && dotenv -e ./env/.env.production -- pnpm run seed:undo:all
scripts.seed:redo:all:production: pnpm run dotenv:cli:init && dotenv -e ./env/.env.production -- pnpm run seed:undo:all && pnpm run seed:all
scripts.seed:all:docker: docker exec -it volo-backend pnpm run seed:all
scripts.seed:undo:all:docker: docker exec -it volo-backend pnpm run seed:undo:all
scripts.seed:redo:all:docker: docker exec -it volo-backend pnpm run seed:undo:all && pnpm run seed:all
scripts.database:migrate:docker:production: (docker exec -it volo-backend npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma generate) && npx prisma generate
scripts.database:migrate:docker:development: (docker exec -it volo-backend npx prisma migrate dev && npx prisma generate) && npx prisma generate
scripts.database:migrate:undo:all:docker: (docker exec -it volo-backend rm -rf prisma/migrations/* && npx prisma generate) && npx prisma generate
scripts.database:pull:docker: docker exec -it volo-backend npx prisma db pull
scripts.database:push:docker: docker exec -it volo-backend npx prisma db push
scripts.database:migrate:development: pnpm run prisma:init && pnpm run dotenv:cli:init && dotenv -e ./env/.env.development -- prisma migrate dev
scripts.database:pull:development: pnpm run prisma:init && pnpm run dotenv:cli:init && dotenv -e ./env/.env.development -- prisma db pull
scripts.database:push:development: pnpm run prisma:init && pnpm run dotenv:cli:init && dotenv -e ./env/.env.development -- prisma db push
scripts.database:migrate:production: pnpm run prisma:init && pnpm run dotenv:cli:init && dotenv -e ./env/.env.production -- prisma migrate deploy
scripts.database:pull:production: pnpm run prisma:init && pnpm run dotenv:cli:init && dotenv -e ./env/.env.production -- prisma db pull
scripts.database:push:production: pnpm run prisma:init && pnpm run dotenv:cli:init && dotenv -e ./env/.env.production -- prisma db push
